import React from 'react' const RequestsContent = ({ currentRequest, handleAccept, handleDecline }) => ( <>
{currentRequest.name} {currentRequest.group} {currentRequest.rating} Тема ВКР: {currentRequest.theme_str} Тип ВКР: {currentRequest.type} Дополнительно: {currentRequest.additional} Утвердить тему ВКР
); export default RequestsContent;
